fields.name: Chocking
fields.description: To strangle, impede, or obstruct  a player's ability to breath

fields.name: Equipment Interference
fields.description: Includes interference with the mask, snorkel, fins, and swimsuit

fields.name: Foul Start
fields.description: Continue to play, without first returning to the start position

fields.name: Goal Interference
fields.description: To knock over, hold or shift the goal with hands or feet

fields.name: Goal Tending
fields.description: Players, without the ball, pushing or pulling opponent from the goal

fields.name: Holding
fields.description: To hold onto an opponent when he/she does not have the ball

fields.name: Illegal Participation
fields.description: For either on of the teams in the game to have more than 6 players in the water's field of play at any one time

fields.name: Out of Play
fields.description:
When the ball breaks the field of play.
The ball is given to the opposition of the team that last contacted the ball

fields.name: Push Down
fields.description: To Push or Pull an opponent in order to increase one speed

fields.name: Surfaced Ball
fields.description: To break, lead or throw the ball above the water surface

fields.name: Unnecessary Violence
fields.description: To Kick or hit the opponent on purpose or with intent to injured
